attributes.action: Give the United Kingdom public a vote on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give the United Kingdom public a vote on the Lisbon Treaty."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20992


Prime Minister's Office
